Package main

Class AnimalList

java.lang.Object
main.AnimalList
public class AnimalList extends Object
This class create a ObjectList named animalList to store Animals Objects.
The class have methods to add new animals to the list and to fill a Board object with the animals.
Author:
Fernando Tarrino del Pozo (FernandoEsra)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAnimalsToBoard(Board board)
    This method read all the animalList list and fill one map using the animals inside on random valid positions.
    void
    addFish(int amount)
    This method created 'x' differents fishes objects and adds them to the end of the animalList.
    void
    createAnimals(int quantity)
    Create 'x' new Animals and add its to the animalList.
    void
    moveAllAnimals(Board board)
    This method will read all the animals on this list and generate a 10% probability to move one of echa his animals in one random direction.
    Also controll if the animal is a fish to move only through the water.
    Animal
    randomAnimal()
    This method create and return a random Animal (Pig, Goat, Cow or Chicken)
    FishWater
    randomFish()
    This method generate a new random fish between the different existing types of fish.

    • addAnimalsToBoard

      public void addAnimalsToBoard(Board board)
      This method read all the animalList list and fill one map using the animals inside on random valid positions.
      Parameters:
      board - The map to fill with animals.

    • createAnimals

      public void createAnimals(int quantity)
      Create 'x' new Animals and add its to the animalList.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The amount of animals to create.

    • randomAnimal

      public Animal randomAnimal()
      This method create and return a random Animal (Pig, Goat, Cow or Chicken)
      Returns:
      A new Animal object.

    • addFish

      public void addFish(int amount)
      This method created 'x' differents fishes objects and adds them to the end of the animalList.
      Parameters:
      amount - How much fishes to create.

    • randomFish

      public FishWater randomFish()
      This method generate a new random fish between the different existing types of fish.
      Returns:
      Return a new fish object.

    • moveAllAnimals

      public void moveAllAnimals(Board board)
      This method will read all the animals on this list and generate a 10% probability to move one of echa his animals in one random direction.
      Also controll if the animal is a fish to move only through the water.
      Parameters:
      board - A board to move the animals of this animalList.
